They were typified by blue eyes and blond hair.{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Aesgaard]]'s entry}}<!-- possibly another ref to mention their light skinn --><!--

| History                 = 
===Origins===
The Aesir were probably descendants of the people of the [[Pre-Cataclysmic Age|pre-Cataclysmic]] [[Thule (Kingdom)|kingdom of Thule]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #40|; A Gazeteer of the Hyborian Age, Part VIII: Vanir's entry}} as were the [[Aesir (Nordheimr)|Aesir]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #14|; A Kull Glossary: [[Thule (Kingdom)|kingdom of Thule]]'s entry}}{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #40|; A Gazeteer of the Hyborian Age, Part VIII: [[Vanir (Nordheimr)|Vani]]'s entry}}<!-- " -->

===[[Hyborian Age]]<!-- temporary section -->===
2,500 years after the [[Lesser Cataclysm]], the Nordics (Aesir and Vanir)<!-- , or [[Nordheimr]], --> drove all the remaining [[Hyborians|Hyborian tribes]] out of all the snow-countries, save for [[Hyperborea]]. Their land was known as [[Nordheim]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #12|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 3: The Hyborian Kingdoms}} the Vanir living in [[Vanaheim (Hyboria)|Vanaheim]], the western part of it.{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Vanaheim (Hyboria)|Vanaheim]]'s entry}}<!-- mentions the fall of Hyperborea the Elder at the hands of the Aesir, who mingled and produced the "modern" Hyperboreans -->

500 years after the [[Age of Conan]], the north was the theater of constant bickering between the [[Cimmerians]], the [[Bossonians]], the [[Picts (Earth-616)|Picts]] and the Nordheimr.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #15|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 4: The Beginning of the End}}<!--
